document.full_text: hundreds of prisoners escaped from a jail in afghanistan's south on monday through a tunnel dug by taliban insurgents, officials said, a "disaster" for the afghan government and a setback for foreign forces planning to start a gradual withdrawal within months.
document.title: taliban free hundreds in brazen afghan jailbreak
lines_and_colors: hundreds of prisoners escaped from a jail in afghanistan's south on monday through a tunnel dug by taliban insurgents, officials said, a "disaster" for the afghan government and a setback for foreign forces planning to start a gradual withdrawal within months.
